file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-30-11-06 - WING-TO-FUSELAGE FAIRING - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL WING-TO-FUSELAGE FAIRING - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: EMB-145 LR/LU/MR/MP/MK/EU/EP/ER AND EMB-135 LR/KE/KL/ER 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of wing-to-fuselage fairing for general condition. B. Related Zone: 191/192/193/194/195. C. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 10229.0 thru STA X = 13601.0. (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 8217.5 thru STA X = 11595.0. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 13601.0 thru STA X = 16783.5. (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 11595.0 thru STA X = 14777.5. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 16783.5 thru STA X = 20230.0. (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 14777.5 thru STA X = 18320.8. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 13601.0 thru STA X = 16783.5. (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 11595.0 thru STA X = 14777.5. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EMB-145 LR/LU/MR/MP/MK/EU/E WING-TO-FUSELAGE FAIRING - EXTER- 05-30-11-200-801-A ♦ P/ER and EMB-135 NAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION LR/KE/KL/ER EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-30-11 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-30-11-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: EMB-145 LR/LU/MR/MP/MK/EU/EP/ER and EMB-135 LR/KE/KL/ER 2. WING-TO-FUSELAGE FAIRING - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 53-Z191-213-001-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of forward, center, rear, and lateral wing-to-fuselage fairing, at zones 191, 192, 193, 194, and 195, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the external general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300 LIGHT DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300 HEAVY DIRT - SERVICING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing-to-fuselage fairing I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A EFFECTIVITY: EMB-145 LR/LU/MR/MP/MK/EU/EP/ER and EMB-135 LR/KE/KL/ER (1) If necessary, clean the inspection area (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300) or (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300) as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-11 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) (Figure 602) (Figure 603) (Figure 604) SUBTASK 212-002-A EFFECTIVITY: EMB-145 LR/LU/MR/MP/MK/EU/EP/ER and EMB-135 LR/KE/KL/ER (1) Examine the fuselage zone for loose rivets, latch condition, skin deformation, delaminations, sealant condition, scratches, nicks, cracks, dents, painting bad condition, erosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 601, Figure 602, Figure 603, and Figure 604). (2) Examine the honeycomb, access door and emergency light for general condition (Figure 604). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-11 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
